about_the_game:
Lord! Gather your hand, defeat all kinds of forces (and win their people over), and become the ruler of the Three Kingdoms! That’s your mission!

In this game, you’ll use the cards in your deck to form specific card combinations, dealing damage to enemies!

Once you defeat an enemy, they’ll join your ranks (and maybe even your harem)!

Card Types:

  • Single: A single card, like an A.

  • Pair: Two cards of the same rank, like KK.

  • Consecutive Pairs: Two or more pairs in a row, like 33 and 44.

  • Straight: Five or more consecutive single cards, like 3-4-5-6-7 (doesn’t include 2).

  • Three of a Kind: Three cards of the same rank, like QQQ.

  • Consecutive Threes: Two or more consecutive three-of-a-kind sets, like 333 and 444 (doesn’t include 2).

  • Bomb: Four or more cards of the same rank, like 6666.

  • Consecutive Bombs: Two or more consecutive sets of bombs, like 6666 and 7777.

Attack Power Calculation:

  • Number cards have attack power equal to their rank. J, Q, and K are worth 10, and A is worth 11.

  • Every card in a combination contributes to the total attack power.

Actual Attack Power = (Total Attack Power of All Cards in the Combination + Base Attack Power of the Combination) × Attack Multiplier of the Combination.
